import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogBody, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogOverlay, Button, Text, Box, } from '@chakra-ui/react' import { useRef } from 'react'; const ReviewRequestDialog = (props) => { const cancelRef = useRef() return ( <> Confirm {props.full && Approve request for entire shift off on {props.date}?} {!props.full && <> Input new on: {props.date}
  • Adjusted start time: {props.start}
  • Adjusted end time: {props.end}
 } ) } export default ReviewRequestDialog;
